name: Apli
description: Apli is a recruiting automation platform that connects candidates to jobs 50 times faster than with traditional methods. With technology, we can fill billions of work days that are currently being lost because companies can’t hire fast enough or bad candidate profiling leads to high turnover. Apli was named in 2019 and 2018 to Fast Company's list of Top 10 Most Innovative Companies In Latin America and was recognized as a leader in Future of Work solutions by MIT’s Initiative on the Digital Economy.

Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees

enhanced_description: Apli is an AI-powered recruiting automation platform designed to accelerate hiring and reduce turnover by connecting candidates to jobs significantly faster than traditional methods. It offers intuitive conversational applications, built-in skills assessments, video interviewing, and streamlined interview coordination. The platform automates candidate screening using AI to identify top talent and enhance the candidate experience through engaging ads, interactive job descriptions, and mobile-friendly applications. Apli also supports effective onboarding with a consistent journey including videos, training, surveys, and responsive support. Recognized by Fast Company as a Top 10 Most Innovative Company in Latin America (2019 and 2018) and by MIT’s Initiative on the Digital Economy as a leader in Future of Work solutions, Apli aims to help companies hire top talent faster and more efficiently, boost hiring manager confidence and productivity, and reduce the cost of hiring qualified employees.
